title: cant figure out my mystery skin from riot :(
body: i have not played for 2-3 weeks and i just received a mystery gift from riot, but i don't know what the skin was. can someone tell me how i can find out please and thanks.

replies.body: I don't see any recent gifts or rewards here, aside form the Teemoing icon on the 7th.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'd be happy to offer more context individually through a private venue.  Our billing team will reply back asap!
